alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 9:55AM PST until December 26 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, South Central Elko County and Southwest Elko County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
